query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_tasks,
  SUM(CASE WHEN assignedTo IS NOT NULL AND JSON_TYPE(assignedTo) = 'ARRAY' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as array_tasks,
  SUM(CASE WHEN assignedTo IS NOT NULL AND JSON_TYPE(assignedTo) != 'ARRAY' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as non_array_tasks
FROM tasks;
command:

  COUNT(*) as total_tasks,
  SUM(CASE WHEN assignedTo IS NOT NULL AND JSON_TYPE(assignedTo) = 'ARRAY' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as array_tasks,
  SUM(CASE WHEN assignedTo IS NOT NULL AND JSON_TYPE(assignedTo) != 'ARRAY' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as non_array_tasks
FROM tasks;
